message.name: HEARTBEAT
message.description: The heartbeat message shows that a system is present and responding. Currently contains the locomotion module mode and mavlink version
message.field: mode of the locomotion module, see LOCOM_MODE enum
MAVLink version, not writable by user, gets added by protocol because of magic data type: uint8_t_mavlink_version
